hero.title:
Florian Lefebvre,

**fullstack** web developer

*& more*
hero.description: Hey! I'm a french web developer, involved in **open-source** and interested in **UI/UX design**, **project management** and more. Scroll down to know more about me!

about.title:
From **self-taught** to

**graduate**.

Still **passionate**.
content: It all started when I was 13 with a video from [Nico](https://www.youtube.com/@user-bn6hi6eq1s) that made me want to develop games with Unreal Engine 4. At the beginning of high school, I then turned to web development. I am now about to follow a course at [Le Wagon](https://www.lewagon.com/web-development-course) and get the diploma of web designer and developer.

I learned a lot of things throughout my apprenticeship, and not only in web development! I have skills in UI/UX design (I worked on design systems), project management (with amazing tools like [Linear](https://linear.app)) and I have continued to learn new technologies and improve my skills.
Even if I am passionate about web development, it is not the only thing in my life. I am also a musician for more than 10 years! Click on the link below to learn more.
